snippet.title: Plague of Athens VR | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience history's first recorded pandemic in this groundbreaking VR experience, now available on Meta Quest, Steam VR, and Pico platforms.

Travel back to 429 BCE and become Nikos, a young physician in ancient Athens confronting an unprecedented crisis. As plague ravages the city and war looms on the horizon, every choice you make could mean life or death. Navigate through faithfully recreated environments, from the wealthy estates overlooking the Acropolis to the cramped, filthy streets surrounding the Agora, now transformed by fear and disease. 🏺🦠

Key Features:
🎯 Make critical decisions that question your medical ethics
🏛️ Explore historically accurate recreations of ancient Greece
⚕️ Discover medical knowledge through interactive exhibits
🔄 Experience multiple branching storylines and endings

Developed by an international team, led by Spencer Striker, PhD, at Northwestern University in Qatar, with support from the Qatar National Research Fund and the Qatar Research Development and Innovation Council, Plague of Athens VR combines rigorous historical research with cutting-edge VR technology to create an impactful educational experience.

Download now on your VR platform of choice!
🕹️ Meta Quest: https://www.meta.com/experiences/plague-of-athens-vr/4864280823671979/ 
🖥️ Steam VR: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3087480/Plague_of_Athens_VR/ 
🕶️ Pico: https://store-global.picoxr.com/global/detail/1/7384515466145988613 

Learn more at: https://www.historyadventures.co/plague-of-athens-vr/

 #History #Education #Gaming #MetaQuest #SteamVR #Pico #AncientGreece #HistoricalGaming #EdTech #virtualreality 

Created by Spencer Striker, PhD
